Package com.brogrammers.projecttrump.user

Class User

java.lang.Object
com.brogrammers.projecttrump.user.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Class designed to hold user login and favorite information
Author:
Nick Perry
See Also:

    • User

      User Creation Constructor

      username - Username of the new user
      password - Password of the new user

    • removeUser

      Method to remove a user
      Parameters:
      adminUser - Admin executing the removal
      removed - User to be removed
      Returns:
      If the removal was successful

    • loadUsersInit

      Returns:
      HashMap of loaded users

    • isModerator

      Checks if the user has moderator privileges
      Parameters:
      user - User object to check rank
      Returns:
      Whether or not the user is a moderator

      Checks if the user has admin privileges
      Parameters:
      user - User object to check rank
      Returns:
      Whether or not the user is an admin

      Login Method
      Parameters:
      username - Username Given
      password - Password Given
      Returns:
      User Object (or null if invalid login)

    • changePassword

      public static boolean changePassword​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String oldpassword, java.lang.String newpassword)
      Changes the user's password
      Parameters:
      username - Username of user to change password
      oldpassword - Current password of user
      newpassword - New Password of user
      Returns:
      If the password change was successful (a false will indicate invalid login)

    • changeRank

      public static int changeRank​(User adminUser, User promotedUser, Ranks rank)
      Gives the ability to change the rank of a user.
      Parameters:
      adminUser - User of the admin that is promoting
      promotedUser - User being promoted
      rank - New rank of promoted user
      Returns:
      Status code. 0: success 1: no permission (not an admin user) 2: Promoted user does not exist

    • getAllUsers

      public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​User> getAllUsers​(User user)
      Returns all the users that are registered
      Parameters:
      user - Admin user requesting list
      Returns:
      List of users, or null if user requesting is not admin.

      public static int getNumUsers​(User user)
